name: Flying squirrel vs ravens
description:
in ancient times, when people have something besides their computers sometimes they went out (unbelievable, but true). At the time you could see some animals for example flying once. And the game is a story about those. You are a squirrel and try to kill all anoying ravens around. You don't like them they steal your food. To Battle!!!!

Done by one person: Maciej Dominiak (Risist)
